data: “I wonder who will tell her,” I heard somebody say, just outside the arbour.
"I wonder who will tell her," I heard somebody say, just outside the arbour.
Williamson, A. M. (Alice Muriel), 1869-1933; Williamson, C. N. (Charles Norris), 1859-1920; De Maris, Walter [Illustrator]
